name: Super Neon Platformer - Ultrastorm
description:
My entry for the neon #AmazeMeGJ.

Just a simple retro neon 80s styled platformer with precise controls, great level design, and a driving chiptune soundtrack!

Of course, I had much more planned but yada yada yada things turn out differently :D 

Now there are 9 playable early levels even though I built 12, multiple unused game mechanics, oh, and bugs of course:

!IMPORTANT!

- you can only select the first level - otherwise, the game will crash

- rarely the players' wall jump is glitching out. sorry.

- the game ends with an error message

- lots and lots of unintended features ;)

Controls: 

- In the menu screen: Arrow keys and space || controller

- In the level screen: WASD || controller

Have a nice day!

WARNING: This game has fast flickering colors and may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Player discretion is advised!

Update #1: Uploaded a post jam version with all known issues fixed - hopefully... 

...and it literally only took 30 more minutes to get everything done - but isn't that always so with game jam entries :D

Update #2: Took a little bit of time this evening and added a few more levels in the post jam extended version.
